name: Industry Giant 2 HD
description: Economic booms, stock market crashes, oil crises, upswings, triumphs... Now you can become the greatest power in industry! Begin in the year 1900 with little money but large ambitions and through skilful decision-making you can build up an enormous business empire. Make critical decisions which products you should manufacture, where to gather the best raw materials, where to sell them and how to effectively transport them there.

name: Incredible Dracula: The Last Call Collector's Edition
description: Guide Dracula on a madcap quest to find out who's zombifying the masses through their cell phones! Just as the notorious count is settling into his role as a family man, a mysterious epidemic strikes the land - people everywhere are falling under a strange spell delivered through their phones! As Dracula searches for the scoundrel behind this dastardly deed, players must rebuild ransacked villages, collect the resources they need for performing challenging tasks, and overcome awesome obstacles before time runs out. Players who make good use of the bonuses they acquire stand to unlock dozens of unique trophies!

name: Incredible Dracula III: Family Secret - Collector's Edition
description: In Incredible Dracula III - Family Secret, Dracula gets a surprise visit from his family! But after some good times together, they don't seem to want to go home anymore... Just as Dracula's patience starts to wear thin, he discovers his family's estates have been ruined by an evil creature. Can you repair the damage? Play Incredible Dracula III - Family Secret today!

name: Incredible Dracula II: The Last Call
Homeworld: Deserts of Kharak - Deluxe Edition
House of Wonders: Kitty Kat Wedding
Hawaiian Explorer: Lost Island
description: Go on a tropical adventure at the Hawaii island. Discover the secret that the island holds.

name: RaceRoom - Audi Sport TT Cup 2015
description: Take 24 identical thoroughbred race cars and place the hottest young driving talents in them. This is the Audi Sport TT Cup. The physics model of this car has been developed in cooperation with the Audi Sport TT Cup drivers, and the whole package, drives, brakes and handles just like the real thing.

name: RaceRoom - DTM Experience 2015
description: The DTM Experience 2015 DLC is based on the popular German Touring Car series "DTM" (Deutsche Tourenwagen-Masters). It contains all cars, teams and tracks of the DTM Season 2015.

name: Virtual Farm 2
description: Harvest the fruits of your labor for profit in Virtual Farm 2, a wonderful challenge to become the top farmer in town. Raise bumper crops to produce the delicious products that people want. Dig up soil, plant seeds, and harvest the produce. From there, you'll need to process your goods into delicious treats such as cheese, ice cream, cakes and more.

name: Voodoo Chronicles: First Sign - Collector's Edition
War of the Human Tanks: Alter - Royal Edition
War of the Human Tanks: Limited Operations - Unlimited Edition
Wars Across the World: Classic Collection
Weather Lord: In Pursuit of the Shaman
description: Unleash the awesome power of nature in Weather Lord: In Pursuit of the Shaman! An earthquake has devastated a once peaceful land and shattered the lives of its natives. But that was only the start of their troubles! The country is now teeming with unpleasant creatures, and an evil shaman is making a bid for absolute power. As a weather lord, you must lead a band of brave warriors across the ruined landscape to defeat the enemy.

name: Weird Park: Broken Tune - Collector's Edition
description: Uncover the truth to the demise of an amusement park in Weird Park - Broken Tune, a twisted tale of terror. Louie the Clown suffered a terrible mishap that ultimately led to the closing of the amusement park. An investigative journalist looking into the incident mysteriously disappeared. The newspaper he worked for has hired you, a private detective, to get to the bottom of this mystery.

name: WMS Rome and Egypt Slot Machine
WMS Slots Adventure: War For Olympus
WMS Slots: Quest for the Fountain
World Class Poker with T.J. Cloutier
Goblin Defenders: Steel 'n' Wood
description: Tired of boring tower defense games? Goblin Defenders: Steel 'n' Wood breaks the mold with exciting and unique action! Why fight off enemies pouring in from one direction, like most other games, when you can battle hordes of monsters coming at you from all angles? That's what Goblin Defenders is all about!

name: Ferrum's Secrets: Where is grandpa? - Collector's edition
Without Memory
description: The main concept of the game is based on the idea of the existence of three parallel worlds. Player actions in one universe affect events in the other two. The main key feature of the game will be a non-linear narrative that supposes multiple endings. This variety will be reached due to three playable characters, each of which could be killed or survive depending on the player decisions.

name: First Strike: Final Hour - Deluxe Edition
Fantasy Grounds: Savage Worlds Setting - Weird Wars II
Europa Universalis IV: Digital Extreme Edition
Europa Universalis IV: Common Sense Collection
Europa Universalis IV: Conquest of Paradise Collection
Europa Universalis IV: Mare Nostrum Collection
Europa Universalis IV: Rights of Man Collection
Europa Universalis IV: The Art of War Collection
Europa Universalis IV: The Cossacks Collection
Europa Universalis IV: The El Dorado Collection
Europa Universalis IV: Wealth of Nations Collection
Eternal Journey: New Atlantis Collector's Edition
Euro Fishing: Foundry Dock
description: Swap the calm stillness of lakeside fishing for a busy city environment that isn’t your average fishing venue! This 11-acre lake doesn’t skimp on the wildlife though, with plenty of new fish to target, hunt and catch.

name: Eisenhorn: Xenos - Deluxe Edition
description:
The Deluxe Edition of Eisenhorn: Xenos includes:

- A digital copy of Eisenhorn: XENOS the game
- Game Soundtrack
- Digital Artbook (Available September)
- Special Eisenhorn: XENOS prequel comic created by TPub (Available Late August)
- Digital copy of the novel 'Xenos' by Dan Abnett

name: Tiddlywinks 2016
description: The ultimate tiddlywinks simulator for PlayStation 4 system.

name: TimeSplitters 4
description: TimeSplitters 4 was the tentative title for the next instalment in the TimeSplitters series. The Official PlayStation Magazine announced in an article, in late June 2007, that TimeSplitters 4 was to be PlayStation 3 exclusive.

name: Driving Simulator 2012
description: Driving Simulator 2012 is a driving simulator game.

name: The Modern Zombie Taxi Co.
description: A PlayStation VR exclusive being developed by Vitei Backroom in collaboration with Sony Santa Monica were players take control of a zombie taxi driver

name: The Outsider
description: The Outsider was an action-adventure game for Windows, PlayStation 3 and Xbox 360 developed by Frontier Developments. It was announced in 2005 and cancelled in 2011.

name: The Chainsaw Incident
description: The Chainsaw Incident is a high-definition 2D horror/comedy fighting game.

name: The Dark Sorcerer
description: A next generation comedy from Quantic Dream.

name: Doorways: The Entire Collection of Nightmares
Demetrios: The BIG Cynical Adventure - Deluxe Edition
Defenders of Ardania: The Conjurer's Tricks
description: Defenders of Ardania: The Conjurer’s Tricks provides a new collection of units, towers and spells that can be used to conquer your opponents. Use new tactics and strategies to outwit the enemies. This collection comes with one new unit, tower and spell for each race. Key Features: UNITS Human - Bomb Cart: A special explosive unit.

name: Crusader Kings II: Songs of the RU
Crusader Kings II: The Reaper's Due Collection
Crusader Kings II: Way of Life Collection
Crush Your Enemies: Complete Plundered Edition
Classic Collection
description: Four Genesis games on one cartridge. Released only in Europe.

name: D4 Complete Edition
description: D4 Complete Edition is a bundle on steam that gives you the first complete season along with all the DLC's.

name: Dark Lore Mysteries: Hunt For the Truth
Dark Strokes: Sins of the Fathers - Collector's Edition
Cook for the Giant
description: A speed reading game: quickly read through a recipe to find out which ingredients to throw into a huge cauldron.

name: Skate.
description: Refreshed with a forever vision in mind. Reimagined with the skate. community - you - guiding us through development. We’re listening to you. Join us on this journey and help shape the future of skate.

name: Craft of Gods
description: Craft of Gods is a 3D MMORPG, based on Slavic mythology.

name: Sky Gods
description: Sky Gods was a game being made by BlackFoot Studios. It was canceled, but elements of the game will be incorporated into another BlackFoot Studies game called "Ground Branch".

name: Scopophobia
description:
A first-person horror game taking place in a Victorian setting.

The game was announced on August 16, 2014 for PC and next-gen consoles (presumably Xbox One and PlayStation 4).

name: Scratch: The Ultimate DJ
description: Presumably cancelled, Scratch: The Ultimate DJ was a game played using a turntable controller, the "Scratch Deck," designed by Numark, which promised to "allow players to re-imagine songs on the fly and add their own creativity."

name: Runemaster
description: A canceled, norse-inspired fantasy RPG from Paradox Interactive, creators of the Crusader Kings and Europa Universalis franchises.

name: Cities: Skylines Collection
description:
Cities: Skylines is a modern take on the classic city simulation. The game introduces new game play elements to realize the thrill and hardships of creating and maintaining a real city whilst expanding on some well-established tropes of the city building experience.

Get the full experience with the Cities: Skylines Collection that features 8 Expansions, 4 Content Creator Packs and 8 Music Packs featuring our own in-house DJ that will spin the tracks while you build your city!

name: Youda Fairy
description: The wise old forest wizard has provided a watchful eye over the kingdom for over 1000 years. This epic battle between the forces of good and evil is as old as time itself, but now the kingdom is danger. The Forest Wizard must leave the kingdom and he is now seeking a replacement. He wants you to become the new forest wizard and guard the kingdom against the wicked enchantments and spells of the evil witch in Youda Fairy, a spectacular action-arcade game.

name: Zombie Football Carnage
description: Zombie Football Carnage is an Xbox Live Indie Game that was later ported to the PC.

name: Chicken Invaders 5: Cluck of the Dark Side - Halloween Edition
Chronicles of a Dark Lord: Genesis
Cindy's Sundaes
description: Help Cindy make sundaes in this match three game.

name: Chicken Invaders 4: Christmas Edition
description: Think you're having chicken for dinner this Christmas? Think again.

name: But to Paint a Universe Deluxe
Bus Simulator 16: Man Lion's City A 47 M
description: So you want even more content for your Bus Simulator 16? The first expansion for Bus Simulator 16 includes the compact and versatile MAN Lion’s City A 47 M, 3 new decals, and 3 new advertising banners, as well as 3 new tracks for your bus radio.

name: Bus Simulator 16: Mercedes-Benz-Citaro
description: Expand your Bus Simulator 16 fleet with three authentically recreated, officially licensed Mercedes-Benz Citaro city buses! With this expansion, you'll be able to drive the nimble Citaro K, the versatile Citaro C2, and the four-door articulated Citaro G.

name: Blade Ballet: Turntable Edition
description: The Blues and Bullets comic is an interactive app that will immerse you in the story, passions, motivations and dark secrets of the characters that, in one way or another, are caught in the web of intrigue that will shape the destiny of the dark and vibrant city of Santa Esperanza.

name: Battlefleet Gothic: Armada - Tau Empire
description: The alien Tau Empire has rapidly expanded across the galaxy, aided by highly advanced technology and a total dedication to the Greater Good philosophy. Their fleets excel at long range, with powerful weapons dealing massive amounts of damage from afar.

name: Beat Bros
description: A music rhythm game for XBLA.

name: Birthdays the Beginning: Digital Limited Edition
NBA Elite 11
description:
EA's renamed basketball simulation set for an October 2010 release was cancelled at the last minute due to concerns over quality. The game was intended to introduce brand new control concepts and mechanics meant to innovate on the simulation basketball genre.

Developers of the Xbox 360 and PlayStation 3 versions aimed to completely change the game's control system but were pressed for time with an 18-month development cycle. A demo released during development was plagued with glitches that were much publicized, including one YouTube video of player Andrew Bynum stuck in the middle of the court in the model's bind pose.
Copies of the PlayStation 3 version that entered circulation are considered rare collector's items.

name: NBA Live 13
description: After two years off (and a cancelled name change), NBA Live was set to return for the 2012-2013 NBA season before it was officially cancelled on September 27, 2012. This marks the third year in a row that EA did not release an NBA simulation game.

name: Ashes of the Singularity: Escalation Gold
Armello: Collector's Edition
description: Armello is a grand swashbuckling adventure that combines three styles of play; The deep tactics of card games with the rich strategy of table top board games, combined with a character role-playing system. A rich game full of backstabbing, close shaves, shattered alliances, ruses and empty promises, Armello is a perfect game to play with your friends. The Armello: Collector's Edition includes the base game, The Dragon Clan, The Bandit Clan, The Usurpers Hero Pack, The Rivals Hero Pack, Seasons Board Skins Pack, and the original soundtrack.

name: Aporia: Beyond the Valley - Deluxe Edition
Affairs of the Court: Deluxe Edition
Mad Blocker HD
description: A PS Move-enabled version of PSP Minis title Mad Blocker.

name: Lily Bergamo
description: As development progressed, the concept and direction of the game evolved. Lily Bergamo was eventually reimagined into Let It Die, which retained some of the core themes but introduced a new gameplay style and setting. Let It Die was released as a free-to-play action game in 2016, marking a shift from the original vision of Lily Bergamo.

name: A New Beginning: Final Cut Edition
Kodoku
description: Indie horror game inspired by Japanese mythology.

name: Lacrosse 15
description: A Lacrosse simulation game coming to PlayStation 4, Xbox One, and PC.

name: Colony Defense
description: Colony Defense is 360 degrees of fast-paced tower defense strategy where the player has to defend an entire planet and multiple paths against invading alien forces. Defend each planets colonies from the alien onslaught in this high action, strategy title with 10 upgradable weapons.

name: Combat Mission Afghanistan
description: Second game to be released using the CMx2 engine, covering the Russian-Afghan wars. Its timeframe includes 1980-82 and then 1985-87.

name: Chronicle Keepers: The Dreaming Garden - Collector's Edition
Clover: A Curious Tale
description: Adventure platform puzzle for Xbox 360 Live Arcade platform

name: Brunhilda and the Dark Crystal
description: Brunhilda and the Dark Crystal is an adventure game from Codeminion and Twin Bottles.

name: Camping Manager 2012
description: Camping Manager 2012 is a simulation game developed by Astragon.

name: Cardboard Castle
description: In his cardboard cut-out world, a noble fearless knight travels his cardboard cut-out trail in search of frightened orphans, damsels in distress, and the occasional princess to save. On his path lurk unspeakable dangers - hideous monsters, hellfire, and dark bottomless pits - that YOU have to overcome.

name: Breaking The Rules: The Roman Tournament
Black Market
description: Fight or fly, trade or die. Machines scheme, ghosts plot, corporations conspire; space can be a dangerous place. Equip your ship, explore new worlds and unravel the mysteries of the Market...

name: Big Sky
description:
Up in the Big Sky you find yourself loss amongst levels of puzzling platforms and you have to find your way to safety.
Your life as a simple ball the toy of child has led to this day. Toss or kicked one time to many you are now loss in the Big Sky. It is up to you to find your way back to the green grass yard that you call home. The path home is full of danger and challenge. Trust yourself and move with confidence.

name: Bilbo: The Four Corners of the World
Bio Guardian
description: Bio Guardian is a top-down shooter game by Oniric Factor.

name: Around the World in 80 Days Extended Edition
Apothecarium: Renaissanse of Evil - Collector's Edition
ArkLight
description: Break through the Krainian Empire's defenses in this twist on the Arkanoid genre.

name: Amanda Rose: The Game of Time
description: Amanda's father departs for Arizona after taking a strange call from a friend requesting his presence. The next morning, Amanda receives a package from her father indicating that no matter what she hears, he is still alive. Odd she thinks, but soon enough an officer calls her, confirming her father's message. Now, as Amanda investigates his disappearance, she is about to stumble into an adventure of unimaginable significance.

name: Amelie's Café: Summer Time
description: Make your mark at an island resort with Amelie's Café - Summer Time, the sun-bathed sequel to the hit game. Amelie is headed for the tropics after successfully restoring her grandfather's old café. She only has three things on her mind however, and those are sun-drenched days, carefree nights, and opening the best beachfront café an island paradise has ever seen.

name: Amelie's Cafe
description: Manage a busy cafe and keep your famished customers fed in Amelie's Cafe, a fast-paced new time management game. Help Amelie keep her cooks busy, her customers full, and her cafe sparkling in more than 50 levels of frenzied fun. Featuring three unique cafe interiors and three great game modes, Amelie's Cafe is sure to satisfy your craving for fast fun.

name: Amelie's Cafe: Holiday Spirit
description: Celebrate the holidays with Amelie's Café - Holiday Spirit, a cheerful Christmas sequel in the hit series. Winter is now upon us and so is the most wonderful time of the year. Join Amelie as she spreads goodwill to all, preparing yuletide favorites for her customers and earning enough to fill Santa's Sleigh!

name: Amelies Cafe Halloween
description: Feed ghoulish guests in Amelie's Café - Halloween, a delightfully spooky sequel to the hit series. Summer is gone, the nights are darker, and an uneasy chill fills the Fall air. What a better time for Amelie to create a new themed café to keep her customers visiting? She's got the perfect idea and the perfect menu. All that remains now is the right type of guests to join the festivities.

name: American Lowriders
description: A racing game with a realistic gameplay physics.

name: Amusement Park
description: A visual novel about a young man who takes over as manager of the faltering amusement park "Fantasy Gardens", trying to turn it around and make it a success again.

name: Ancient Rome
description:
Imperator Caesar and Senate need your managerial skills. Their extensive plans on development of the Roman Empire call for people able to put the policy of Rome in remote provinces into life. The game Ancient Rome is economic strategy, in which the Governor will need much wisdom for management and development of the territories of the Roman Empire. Few will be able to complete the tasks assigned by Caesar and Senate. But legends glorifying their wisdom will be composed of those few who will cope with hardships and difficulties in the new territories. Do not withhold trust of Caesar and Senate. The Imperator’s Counselor will be assigned to assist you, he will direct you and help with his wise advices in hour of need. You will have to master several dozens of settlements that afterwards will be turned into powerful cities. You must take the first step to settle these territories and prepare them for settlement by roman citizens. Praise and rewards won’t keep you waiting. Build, trade, develop and the world of Rome is your oyster! At this site you can download the demo version of the game Ancient Rome for free, after playing it you may buy the full version of the game Ancient Rome.

Interesting story, immersing into the game world. 30 levels will guarantee the hours-long suspenseful game. Unusual system of the player’s rewards. creates great atmosphere of ancient Rome. Various types of structures and goods. Possibility for building Roman Empire of your own.

name: Age of Enigma: The Sixth Ghost
A Girl in the City: Extended Edition
description: Set out and conquer the Big Apple with A Girl in the City, a fabulous seek-and-find search through New York.

name: Cubetastic
description:
All you have to do is to avoid hitting the obstacles(or falling off the ground) and try to reach the end.

Don't think that it is an easy game

(WARNING: NO ONE HAS BEEN ABLE TO COMPLETE THE GAME)

name: Cutesy Christmas: A Very Merry Rescue
Cypher: Cyberpunk Text Adventure - Collector's Edition
Cypher: Cyberpunk Text Adventure - Deluxe Edition
Cradle of Rome 2
description: Cradle Of Rome 2 is the sequel to the hit match 3 game - Cradle Of Rome. Cradle of Rome 2 challenges your puzzling skills! Participate in a long and sweet adventure to the ancient land of Rome!

name: Conspiracies II: Lethal Networks
description: Conspiracies II is a Full Motion Video (FMV) 3d adventure game.

name: Jengo
description: Jengo is a point and click adventure about Jeff who finds himself lost in the Pixelverse, a land of forgotten game characters. Jengo is an old school point and click adventure game inspired by the golden era of the genre.

name: I See Your Pain
description: Life is useless and full of lies, betrayal and disappointment. I’ve been hurt for so long. It’s time to pull the knives out of my back and aim it to the enemies.

name: Henka Twist Caper
description: Similar to Johan Sebastian Joust, this physical local multiplayer game has players trying to score points by keeping their controller in a certain position while keeping their opponents from doing the same.

name: Geronimo Stilton: The Return to the Kingdom of Fantasy
Grand Values: Monaco
description: Grand Values: Monaco is an exciting story-driven 3D stealth game about the young thief, Amy, and her friends descending into danger and infamy against the filthy-rich millionaires of Monaco. With a dramatic new pickpocket mechanic for the big steals, a focus on the fun of stealth gameplay, and a cartoon art style different from anything else in the genre, it represents a unique offering to the player – both stealth aficionados and those new to this style of game.

name: Dust 514: Neocom
description: This is the supplementary PS Vita game to dust 514. In this game, Dust:514 players create and edit customized fittings (load-outs) with a huge variety of dropsuits, weapons, equipment, modules and vehicles.

name: Cliff Diving
description: Take the plunge into an incredible augmented reality experience.

name: WWE 2K17: Hall of Fame Showcase Edition
Yomawari: Night Alone - Digital Pitch Dark Edition
Youda Legend: The Curse of the Amsterdam Diamond
description: Puzzle through the mysteries of Amsterdam to find out more about an old, dark curse that still haunts this beautiful city in the hope of finding a legendary diamond. Use your eagle eyes and common sense to lead you through an exciting adventure passing the Rijksmuseum, the Flower Market and many other famous places like never before. Starting at your hotel, combine clues and solve puzzles to uncover the mysteries that will finally lead you to the greatest diamond you have ever seen!

name: ZoomBook: The Temple of the Sun
Legion Commander
description: Legion Commander is a real time strategy game for PS VR platfom developed by ChangYou Games.

name: Aero-Cross
description:
Aero-Cross is an unreleased platform video game that was in development for the PlayStation 3 and Xbox 360 by Namco Bandai Games. It was intended as a modernized sequel to the arcade game Metro-Cross, and the third released under the Namco Generations series of video game remakes.

Players control a runner through each level in an effort to get to the end stage goal before the timer runs out. Levels feature hazards that must be overcome, and there are also power-ups that grant player with different abilities, such as a speed boost or being able to glide over the level.

name: The Walker
description: The Walker is an adventure game made by chinese developers Heymaker and Renyi Tech. LLC.

name: Naev
description: Naev is a game about space exploration, trade and combat. Players travel the galaxy and earn money by trading, fighting and performing missions.

name: Jewel Witch Tale
description:
TAP CONNECT, BLAST MAGIC & COLLECT JEWELS! 
 
Classic connection matching puzzle game with unique gameplay! It’s jewel witch tale! 
 
Join the graduation trip of Mila and help her collect the colorful jewels, cute monsters and more! 
 
Connect 3 or more jewels of the same color to clear the level and collect jewels and cute monsters. Connect magic bottles can unleash powerful magic which help you clear more levels. Your talent in solving puzzles will be the ultimate magic when you enjoy the colorful adventure. 
 
Earn rewards every day in Daily Magic Wheel. Discover Mila’s magic lands from jewel valley to fugu’s cove. Different cute monsters will amaze you. Already done ’em? One-up your friends with high scores and stars. Please note who is the best witch in your leaderboard. 
 
There’s plenty to do in the game and growing number of levels are coming soon. So get into jewel witch tale! 
 
Features: 
– Play 100 fun levels, with more added soon and all the time 
– Unique gameplay & strategic level challenge 
– Easy and fun to play but hard to master 
– Easy to pick up and play any time, any place even offline 
– Create and use magic boosters & power-ups to help Mila; her boots, broom, wand and hat. 
– Play with friends when you connect to Facebook

name: Ghost in the Shell: Arise - Stealth Hounds
description:
"Sound Reveals the Concealed
Team PVP Field VR activity has finally arrived!
Shoot down enemies while moving freely through a wide open arena!

As a rookie of the special force team created by Motoko Kusanagi, join in the fight against the terrorist organization.

Experience this activity on a large dedicated 20m X 12m arena with a highly sophisticated multi-person full body tracking system.
A maximum of up to 8 players can participate in this 4 vs 4 team battle.

Employ iconic, powerful technology from Ghost in the Shell such as optical camouflage, prosthetic body, cyberbrain, etc. Become fully immersed and experience futuristic warfare for yourself."

name: Dark and Light: Tales of Gaia
description:
Long before Gaia was shattered by the invasion of darkness, its people were drawn into a fierce war along faction lines. As humans, elves, and dwarves battle each other in an attempt to take over the planet, they each enlist the help of forces beyond their control. Dragons and dark magic are powerful weapons with unforeseen consequences. Who will emerge victoriously? And what will become of Gaia's future? 
Hack, slash, and blast your way through a massive magical world, hold your own in real-time combat, destroy epic bosses, and so much more in Dark and Light: Tales of Gaia. The planet's fate is in your hands.

name: Leilani's Island
description: Leilani has got to roll, jump, and smash things to take back her island from mechanical invasion! A tropical 2D platformer in the making for PC.

name: Ultimate Summer Boat
description: What exactly you always wanted to do with your rented boat? Are you sure it was just row gently down the stream?

name: Samurai Forge
description: Samurai Forge is a Collectible Card Game unlike anything you have ever played before!

name: Tilted - A Tale of Refraction
description: Tilted is a game where you play as a prism navigating its way through mesmerizing crystalline caverns and solving puzzles by using the laws of reflection and refraction, in a quest for photons and ultimately Illuminating the universe, overrun by darkness and other hazards. With it's intuitive controls and an engaging gameplay.

name: Sword of the Stars: The Pit Gold Edition - Juggernaut
Sword of the Stars: The Pit Gold Edition - Necromancer
The Real Texas: Cellpop Goes Out At Night
description: Cellpop Goes Out At Night is an adventure rpg taking place at a shopping mall on the Planet of the Friendeyes.

name: The Real Texas: Dusty Skies Edition
Through the Woods: Collector's Edition
description: Through the Woods: Collector's Edition contains base game with the addition of a digital artbook and soundtrack. Through the Woods is a third-person Norse horror adventure set in a forest on the western shores of Norway that tells the story of a mother and her missing son.

name: Sins of a Solar Empire: Rebellion - Outlaw Sectors
Starpoint Gemini 2: Titans
description: An arms race is taking place in Gemini. The three largest factions are racing to develop true weapons of mass destruction, the massive Titan class vessels. Join one of the factions in their worthy attempt and become the deciding factor. Welcome to project Titan.

name: Starpoint Gemini Warlords: Digital Deluxe Edition
Stealth Inc. 2: A Game of Clones Deluxe
Renowned Explorers: The Emperor's Challenge
description: This expansion pack for Renowned Explorers takes you all the way to the Far East. It's packed with new content and also provides an entirely new way to play the game! The main features are: Four new characters: Suh Min-Jeong, Hojo Fumiaki, Wang Yu and Phailin Boonyasak. All with their own unique abilities and personalities.

name: Risen 2: Dark Waters - Gold Edition
description:
Set several years after the end of Risen, raging titans have devastated the world and pushed humanity to the brink of existence. Subsequently, monstrous creatures have risen from the watery depths of the sea and their attacks have brought all seafaring to a grinding halt.

The hero, now a member of the Inquisition, is sent out to find out how to stop the chaos caused by these creatures from the deep. His quest begins with rumors that the pirates who frequent the southern islands are the only ones who know a way to get rid of the creatures once and for all and end their reign of terror.

name: Omerta: City of Gangsters Gold Edition
description:
The complete collection of tactical gangster simulator, and all its DLCs.

You play the role of an immigrant newly entering a colorful part of New Jersey with little more than big dreams, the player will scale up the criminal hierarchy of 1920’s Atlantic City. Starting with small jobs, their character will recruit a gang and to expand their empire claim territory from other gangsters. Eventually establishing their own crime syndicate and becoming crime lord of Atlantic City.

Players will be able to spot Atlantic City landmarks, engage tactical turn-based combat, plan covert missions to gather intel, manage several unique player controlled characters and customize them utilizing RPG features, all while exploring more than 20 maps.

name: King's Bounty: Warriors of the North - Complete Edition
description: King's Bounty: Warriors of the North is the next chapter in the cult classic RPG/adventure saga, after King's Bounty: The Legend, King's Bounty: Amored Princess and King's Bounty: Crossworlds. The complete Edition contains also DLC Ice and Fire and the Valhalla upgrade.

name: Lords of the Realm: Royal Edition
Men of War: Vietnam - Special Edition
description: The critically acclaimed series returns! Experience Vietnam from both sides of the war.

name: Gods Will Be Watching: Special Edition
Gonner: Press Jump to Die Edition
description:
The Press Jump To Die Edition includes the base game and the soundtrack.

GoNNER is a tough as hell procedurally-generated 2D platformer with roguelike elements, following the largely misunderstood and altruistic Ikk on a journey to cheer up his only friend in this world—a giant landbound whale named Sally—by searching for just the right trinket in the deep and dark places nearby.

With Death as his mentor, supplying both a multitude of abilities and arsenal for Ikk to use, Ikk traverses an ever-changing land full of unwieldy creatures who don't appreciate his trespassing or his friend Sally. Several different environments, arduous bosses, hidden secrets, multiple endings, and more await Ikk on his journey to make one person happy even if it kills him—which it certainly will.

name: Guild of Dungeoneering: Deluxe Ice Cream Edition
Guild of Dungeoneering: Ice Cream Headaches
description: It’s time to send some chumps out to do your dirty work, namely fetch some ice cream. Things get a bit complicated when it turns out the Ice Cream Monks are under siege from Brainiacs intent on destroying all the ice cream. I guess we could team up with them… but maybe there’s a way to turn this situation to the Guild’s advantage?

name: Fallen Enchantress: Ultimate Edition
description:
Includes: 
Fallen Enchantress and the standalone expansion, Fallen Enchantress: Legendary Heroes, the Fallen Enchantress/Fallen Enchantress: Legendary Heroes Map Pack DLC, and the Fallen Enchantress: Legendary Heroes DLC: Battlegrounds, Dead World, Leader Pack, Loot Pack, and Quest Pack

name: Frozen Synapse: Red
description: The multi-award-winning indie strategy masterpiece is back with a brand new expansion pack!

name: Torment: Tides of Numenera - Legacy Edition
Two Worlds II: Epic Edition
description: Two Worlds II Epic Edition includes the original Two Worlds II, the Pirates of the Flying Fortress expansion, and Two Worlds II: Castle Defense.

name: Tyranny: Commander Edition
description:
Players will experience the new world order under Overlord in a reactive role-playing game, interacting with the populace as a powerful Fatebinder in the Overlord's forces -- roaming the lands to inspire loyalty or fear as they bring control to the last holdouts of the Tiers.

Tyranny: Commander Edition includes:
Base Game
Ringtones (three notification tones and one ringtone - located in the Ringtones folder under the game installation directory)

name: Valhalla Hills: Two-Horned Helmet Edition
description: Lead your people. Survive the wilderness. Fight for honor. Reclaim your eternal reward. A brand new strategy game from the developers of Cultures and The Settlers II.

name: War for the Overworld: Anniversary Collection
War for the Overworld: Underlord Edition
X Rebirth: Home of Light - Complete Edition
Gray Grofa
description:
Gray Grofa is an unparalleled side-scrolling shooter puzzle game developed
for the 8-bit MSX computer.
2 years have been spent hand-tuning the game's visuals, movements and
puzzles in a tireless pursuit for aesthetic perfection.

name: The Book of Unwritten Tales 2: Almanac Edition
